title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: Preview and click Show Report Parameters button.
EB: Default values are shown in the value box, allowing me to modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
1. Open the report in Preview mode.
2. Click on the Show Report Parameters button.
3. Verify that the default values are displayed in the value box.
4. Modify the parameter as desired.
